General.Name: YeaShin International Development Co Ltd
General.Description: YeaShin International Development Co., Ltd. engages in the residential and building development business in Taiwan and Malaysia. The company offers congregate housing, stores, offices, and parking spaces; and provides development, lease, and sale of residences and office buildings. It also operates shopping malls, restaurants, and hotels. YeaShin International Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 25, Dunhua South Road, Taipei, Taiwan

1.Name: Ms. Shu-Ying  Wan
1.Title: Assistant VP of Fin. & Accounting Dept.
